channel.title: Discount Card on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Discount Card on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hyundai Card Logo
Hyundai Card is a credit card company under Hyundai Motor Group headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. In 1995, Hyundai Motor Group acquired Diners Club Korea, changed its name to Hyundai Card in 2001. In May 2003, the company introduced its signature ‘Hyundai Card M," followed by a series of ‘alphabet cards.' The company’s strategic alliance with the GE Consumer Finance in October 2005 boosted the fledgling business in the heavily competitive Korean credit card market.
You can download theHyundai Cardlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hyundai Card
item.description: Hyundai Card is a credit card company under Hyundai Motor Group headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. In 1995, Hyundai Motor Group acquired Diners Club Korea, changed its name to Hyundai Card in 2001. In May 2003, the company introduced its signature ‘Hyundai Card M," followed by a series of ‘alphabet cards.' The company’s strategic alliance with the GE Consumer Finance in October 2005 boosted the fledgling business in the heavily competitive Korean credit card market.
